sentences.en: A deep trough divides the two parts of the Antarctic.
sentences.cn: 一道很深的海沟把南极洲一分为二.

sentences.en: As the wave bore down on us, the trough deepened.
sentences.cn: 当波涛向我们压来时, 波谷加深了.

sentences.en: Atoms of a row are comfortable in each trough between the atoms of the neighbouring row.
sentences.cn: 一排原子安处在邻排原子之间的凹沟里.

sentences.en: Looking back afterwards you will see that this was not a terminal trough in your career.
sentences.cn: 今后回想起来你就会明白，这并非你事业中一蹶不振的低谷。

sentences.en: So she quickly emptied her jar into the trough.
sentences.cn: 她迅速地把水罐里的水统统倒进水槽.

sentences.en: Some horses were drinking at a trough.
Such a trough is called flume.
The boat rolled heavily in the troughs between the waves.
sentences.cn: 小船在海浪间的波谷中剧烈地摇晃着。

sentences.en: The old stone cattle trough still sits by the main entrance.
sentences.cn: 陈旧的石制牛食槽仍然放在大门口。

sentences.en: The pigs fed off the same trough.
sentences.cn: 那些猪从同一食槽里取食.

sentences.en: The rocks were folded by collapsing into the center of the trough.
sentences.cn: 岩石由于坍陷进入凹槽的中心而发生褶皱.

sentences.en: The trough is the lowest level of the cycle.
sentences.cn: 谷底是整个周期的最低点.

sentences.en: The trough of low pressure extended over about 1000 kilometres.
There is a longshore trough over there.
They led the workhorses to the watering trough.
sentences.cn: 他们把耕马带到饮水槽去饮水.

sentences.en: Where a trough and crest coincide we get the total amplitude zero.
sentences.cn: 在波峰与波谷重合之处,总振幅实际上为零.

words.tran_cn: 水槽，水槽；[经]低谷期；饲料槽；[气象]低气压

trans.tran_cn: 水槽，食槽，低谷期，[航]深海漕，[气]低气压槽
trans.tran_en: a long narrow open container that holds water or food for animals
